name: Climber
effect: This creature treats all _Obstacles_ as _Climable_.

name: Clumsy
effect: This trait bars you from using certain acrobatic abilities such as _Tumble_.

name: Earthguard
effect: While adjacent to an _Earthen_ _Obstacle_, increase this creature's _Guard_ by 1.

name: Earthwalk
effect: This creature may ignore effects caused by moving into or ending their _Turn_ in _Earthen_ Terrain.

name: Flamewalk
effect: This creature may ignore effects caused by moving into or ending their _Turn_ in  _Flame_ Terrain.

name: Flamebody
effect: This creature's Natural Weapons deal _Fire_ Damage instead of the normal type. This creature takes an additional 1 _True_ Damage and gains _Vulnerable_ 1 whenever they take Damage from Water. Additionally, this creature cannot gain _Soaked_; instead, they take 4 _True_ Damage and gain _Dazed_ 1.

name: Flier
effect: While Moving this creature may choose to be _Flying_.

name: Frostwalk
effect: This creature may ignore effects caused by moving into or ending their _Turn_ in  _Ice_ Terrain.

name: Stormwalk
effect: This creature may ignore effects caused by moving into or ending their _Turn_ in  _Electric_ Terrain.

name: Nimble
effect: At _Respite_ this creature may _Move_ 2 [_Safe_].

name: Resistance
effect: If a creature has Resistance to a type of Damage or Material, increase their _Guard_ by X against it, where X is the listed Resistance value.

name: Warded
effect: If a creature is Warded to a Status they always _Negate_ that Status as if they spent an additional X _Stamina_, where X is the listed _Warded_ value.

name: Stable
effect: Reduce all _Forced Movement_ effects by X against this creature, where X is the listed Stable value.

name: Strong
effect: When this creature attack an _Obstacle_ with a _Weapon_ or _Martial Arts_ Attack, deal +1 Damage and you may treat any _Forced Movement_ as Damage, converting it at a 1 to 1 rate.

name: Swimmer
effect: Swimming does not cost this creature any additional _Movement_.

name: Aquatic
effect: This creature does not have Disadvantage on Attacks while Swimming and creatures do not have Advantage on Attacks against them. Additionally, this creature may ignore effects caused by moving into or ending their _Turn_ in  _Water_ Terrain.

name: Weakness
effect: If a creature has Weakness to a type of Damage or Material, increase Damage dealt by it by X, where X is the listed Weakness value. Additionally, the Attacker may remove X additional _Vulnerable_ as a part of this Attack.

name: Snowdraw
effect: This creature may _Draw_ from _Ice_ spaces.

name: Susceptible
effect: If a creature is Susceptible to a Status, increase the cost to Negate it by 1.

name: Woodwalk
effect: This creature may ignore effects caused by moving into or ending their _Turn_ in _Wooden_ Terrain.

name: Warded
effect: If a creature is Warded against a Status they always _Negate_ as if they have already spent X _Stamina_.

name: Volatile
effect: If a creature is Volatile, deal X of the specified Damage type in a _Burst_ 1 whenever the creature is Damaged.

name: Windwalk
effect: This creature may ignore effects caused by moving into or ending their _Turn_ in _Windy_ Terrain.
